doc.name: GRActor2D
doc.description: A base class for all two-dimensional GR actors. These actors use Diva to render two-dimensional scenes in the GR domain. This is an abstract class that is never used as a standalone actor in a Ptolemy model. Subclasses of this actor include Geometry actors, Transform actors, Interaction actors, and the ViewScreen2D display actor.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer
